techDescriptions.React: React is a JavaScript library for building user interfaces with a component-based architecture.
techDescriptions.Node.js: Node.js is a JavaScript runtime built on Chrome's V8 engine for building scalable network applications.
techDescriptions.PostgreSQL: PostgreSQL is a powerful, open-source object-relational database system with a strong reputation.
techDescriptions.MongoDB: MongoDB is a source-available cross-platform document-oriented database program, using JSON-like documents.
techDescriptions.Figma: Figma is a cloud-based design tool for collaborative interface design, prototyping, and design systems.
techDescriptions.Bootstrap: Bootstrap is a free and open-source CSS framework directed at responsive, mobile-first front-end web development.
techDescriptions.WordPress: WordPress is a free and open-source content management system written in PHP and paired with a MySQL database.
techDescriptions.Postman: Postman is an API platform for building and using APIs. It simplifies API development workflow.
techDescriptions.WooCommerce: WooCommerce is an open-source e-commerce plugin for WordPress, designed for online merchants.
techDescriptions.Shopify: Shopify is an e-commerce platform for online stores and retail point-of-sale systems.
techDescriptions.Material UI: Material UI is a popular React UI framework that implements Google's Material Design.

whoWeHelp.title: Who We Help
whoWeHelp.subtitle: A Trusted Partner for Growing Teams
whoWeHelp.description: We work with agencies, startups, and businesses of all sizes — supporting their teams and projects. We specialize in design, development, and everything in between that matters most.

whatWeDo.description: We build AI-powered web and mobile apps with innovative design and scalable development. Our team delivers seamless UI/UX and solutions to help your business grow smarter and faster.

developmentType.content: Our front-end developers bring designs to life using clean, performant code. We specialize in ReactJS, HTML/CSS, and popular UI libraries like Material UI and Bootstrap.

developmentType.title: Back-End Development
developmentType.heading: Scalable, secure, and efficient backend solutions.
developmentType.content: Our back-end experts create robust, secure, and high-performance server-side applications that power your digital products. We build scalable architecture that grows with your business.

developmentType.description: End-to-end development for fully integrated web apps.
developmentType.heading: End-to-end solutions for complex web applications.
developmentType.content: Our full-stack developers handle every aspect of your project—from user interfaces to server logic to database management. Get a cohesive solution with seamless integration across all layers.
offerings: Seamless data flow between front and back-end

homePage.description: Hire expert front-end developers skilled in ReactJS, Material UI, and modern frameworks. Ideal for agencies looking to scale delivery without growing overhead.

whatWeOffer.title: What We Offer
whatWeOffer.subtitle: Pixel-Perfect Front-End Development, Aligned with Your Designs and Deadlines
whatWeOffer.description: We help web and digital agencies deliver high-quality user interfaces that are responsive, accessible, and fast. Whether you're building a simple landing page or a complex web app, our front-end developers work as an extension of your team to bring your vision to life.

services.title: Design-to-Code Conversion
services.description: Pixel-perfect UI from Figma, Sketch, or PSD files.

services.title: Responsive Web Design
services.description: Optimized layouts for mobile, tablet, and desktop.

services.title: API-Driven Integration Service
services.description: Seamless UI integration with RESTful or headless APIs.

services.title: Cross-Browser Compatibility
services.description: Consistent appearance across Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge.

ourTechStack.title: Our Tech Stack
ourTechStack.description: We use modern, scalable front-end technologies to build fast, responsive, and modular interfaces. Our tech stack ensures performance, maintainability, and future-ready web experiences.

cards.title: Agency-Centric
cards.desc: Specifically designed to support digital and creative agencies with reliable, scalable front-end development services.

cards.title: Speed & Flexibility
cards.desc: Kickstart projects quickly and scale up or down as your client demands change — no overhead, just results.

cards.title: UI-First Thinking
cards.desc: Our developers prioritize design fidelity with responsive, pixel-perfect implementations that bring your mockups to life flawlessly.

cards.title: NDA-Compliant
cards.desc: We work under strict non-disclosure agreements, ensuring full confidentiality while representing your brand seamlessly.

cards.title: Seamless Integration
cards.desc: We collaborate smoothly with your in-house designers, backend developers, and project managers.

howWeWork.title: How We Work
howWeWork.description: Our front-end development process is built to deliver speed, quality, and collaboration.

steps.title: Discovery & Requirements
steps.desc: We define goals, user types, and key screens to ensure alignment before design or development begins.

steps.title: Design Handoff & Planning
steps.desc: We review design files, clarify edge cases, and outline technical scope for smooth project execution.

steps.title: Development
steps.desc: We build responsive, pixel-perfect interfaces using React and modern CSS with clean, scalable code.

steps.title: API Integration
steps.desc: We connect front-end with backend or CMS APIs to handle real-time data and error states reliably.

steps.title: QA & Testing
steps.desc: We test on all screen sizes, ensure WCAG compliance, and validate performance across major browsers.

steps.title: Deployment or Handover
steps.desc: We deliver clean, version-controlled code or coordinate handoff to backend teams for integration.

engagementModels.title: Engagement Models
engagementModels.description: Choose the engagement model that best suits your project needs

models.title: Flexible Time & Material Model for Evolving Needs
points: Ideal for ongoing or evolving tasks

models.title: Dedicated Front-End Developer
points: Full-time resource working under your brand

models.title: Fixed-Cost Model for Defined Scopes
points: Ideal for defined scopes like landing pages or small apps

gotQuestions.title: Got Questions
gotQuestions.description: Clear responses to common questions about how we work and what we deliver.

questions.q: Can I hire a front-end developer for just a week or two?
questions.a: Yes, we offer short-term engagements perfectly suited for urgent UI needs, one-off tasks, or overflow support when your internal team is at capacity.

questions.q: Do your developers follow responsive and accessibility guidelines?
questions.a: Yes, our developers strictly adhere to responsive design principles and established accessibility standards (such as WCAG) to ensure our solutions work seamlessly across devices and are inclusive for all users.

questions.q: Can you work with our in-house backend team?
questions.a: Absolutely! We frequently collaborate with in-house backend teams and other stakeholders, ensuring smooth integration, clear communication, and a cohesive development process.

contactUS.title: Need expert front-end developers?
contactUS.subtitle: Let’s talk about how we can support your agency or project. Our flexible team structure lets you start fast and scale when needed.
